alert.note: Alert for Monroe Upper Keys (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Key West (Key West - The Florida Keys)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 22 at 11:52AM EDT by NWS Key West
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Upper Keys in Monroe County through 1215 PM EDT... At 1152 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm OVER Rock Harbor, or NEAR Key Largo, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jewfish Creek Bridge, Key Largo, Plantation, Route 1/card Sound, Route 1/card Sound Road Split, Rock Harbor, Islamorada and North Key Largo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
